name: Roblaster
description:
Roblaster challenges you with various puzzles which you solve with paint, electricity, fire and other mechanics.

The game features 23 levels, and a level editor for making your own levels.

Roblaster was originally made in 48 hours for the 29th GM48 gamejam, by TonyStr and Jacob Bjørklund.  We continued working on the game after the jam, and this is the result.

Scroll down to download for free
